effects:
Gain 2 uses of the following skills for 3 turns:
	Cheer Up (216290)
	Don't Give Up (216310)
	Don't give up! (221520)
	Get pumped everyone! (221500)
	Here To Heal (216320)
	Here To Help (216280)
	I'll heal you all! (221510) [not usable with 2H weapon]
name: Double Ability - Iris
Double Ability - Iris
W能力・伊莉絲
W어빌리티·아이리스
Double aptitude - Iris
Doppelfähigkeit - Iris
Habilidad doble - Iris
desc_short: Enable special abilities to be used twice in one turn
1回合內可以使用2次特定能力
Permet d'utiliser des aptitudes spéciales à deux reprises en un tour
Ermöglicht es, Spezialfertigkeiten zwei Mal pro Runde zu verwenden.
Las habilidades especiales se pueden usar 2 veces en un mismo turno
